excerpt: "CRISPR Therapeutics AG CRSP announced that its wholly-owned allogeneic CAR-T cell therapy, CTX110, targeting CD19+ B-cell malignancies, has been granted Regenerative Medicine Advanced Therapy (“RMAT”) designation by the FDA."
